thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Molina Healthcare Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $4.59

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Molina Healthcare Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $4.59
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Molina Healthcare Inc:
* MOLINA HEALTHCARE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES FISCAL YEAR 2018 PRELIMINARY GUIDANCE
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $4.59 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.00 TO $3.50 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.73 * ‍Q4 RESULTS INCLUDE $356 MILLION OF IMPAIRMENT LOSSES, RESTRUCTURING AND SEPARATION COSTS, AND LOSS ON DEBT EXTINGUISHMENT​
* ‍2018 PRELIMINARY GUIDANCE OF $3.00 - $3.50 NET INCOME PER SHARE AND $3.23 - $3.73 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER SHARE​
* QTRLY ‍PREMIUM REVENUE $ 4,689 MILLION VERSUS $ 4,190​ MILLION
* SEES ‍2018 PRELIMINARY PREMIUM REVENUE $17.5 BILLION​ * SEES ‍2018 TOTAL REVENUE ABOUT $18.8 BILLION​ * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.49, REVENUE VIEW $19.85 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 ‍PRELIMINARY MEDICAL CARE COSTS ABOUT $15.6B​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
